description:
Kanmuri’s past is brought to light and he may have to retire from his life as a baker! Will he be forced to leave his friends at Pantasia and become… a gangster!? And what’s worse, after getting sick, Kazuma has to sit this match out!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanmuri no Himitsu!! Jingi naki Jam Taiketsu!
Kanmuri`s Secret!! A Jam Battle Without Honor!
Le secret de Kanmuri ! Un match qui part en confiture !
ความลับของคังมุริ!! ศึกแยมที่ไร้คุณธรรม
冠の秘密!! 仁義なきジャム対決!
